title: Analysis of f from Taylor Polynomial

content.question: Let P(x) = 7 − 3(x−4) + 5(x−4)2 − 2(x−4)3 + 6(x−4)4 be the fourth-degree Taylor polynomial for the function f about 4. Assume f has derivatives of all orders for all real numbers. (a) Find f(4) and f‴(4).
